answers.answer: Were you ever tested for diabetes if not get yourself a blood workup.  Sometimes diabetics can have this problem.  Good luck

question: I have a musty sweet (baby Powderish)body odor that is overwhelming.  It even keeps me awake at nights.  It interferes with all colognes.  I also have a sweet taste in my mouth at all times as well and I feel like it is all connected.  I do not eat sweets at all because this causes me to have an aversion to the thought???  Please advise.
title: Sweet Body odor/taste
